name: F-1 Student Visa
description: For full-time students enrolled in an accredited institution.
eligibility: Acceptance at a SEVP-approved school, proof of funds, intent to return home.

name: H-1B Work Visa
duration: Up to 3 years, extendable to 6 years
eligibility: Job offer from a U.S. employer, relevant degree or experience.

name: B-2 Tourist Visa
description: For tourism, vacation, or visiting family.
eligibility: Proof of travel plans, sufficient funds, intent to return home.

name: Study Permit
description: For students attending a designated learning institution.
eligibility: Acceptance at a DLI, proof of funds, no criminal record.

name: Work Permit
description: For temporary workers with a job offer.
eligibility: Valid job offer, LMIA (if required), qualifications.

name: Visitor Visa
eligibility: Proof of ties to home country, sufficient funds.
